author: Rebecca Shabad
title: CDC chief warns 'it's important not to let up at all' as parts of U.S. seek to reopen
description: CDC chief warns 'it's important not to let up at all' as parts of U.S. seek to reopen
content: The director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said Friday that as parts of the U.S. seek to reopen amid the coronavirus outbreak, people should still be vigilant by practicing social distancing, wearing face coverings and washing their hands.… [+5852 chars]
